listen_identify.name: Listen & Identify
listen_identify.prompt: I'll play a phoneme. You say which one it is (Devanagari or IAST).
listen_identify.structure: Play phoneme → user responds with identity

repeat_after.name: Repeat After
repeat_after.prompt: I'll say a phoneme. You repeat it back.

which_different.name: Which is Different?
which_different.prompt: I'll play 3 phonemes. One is different. Which one?
which_different.structure: Play A, B, C (e.g. a, a, aa) → user says 1, 2, or 3

minimal_pair.name: Minimal Pairs
minimal_pair.prompt: I'll play two phonemes. Tell me which is first, which is second.
minimal_pair.structure: Play pair (e.g. ka/ga) → user identifies order
